Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: Ei a freshman in IR eh? Damn I felt like a veteran already since I am about to graduate from my IR bachelor degree by next month. So here are my thoughts about it. On the good side, the revised UU TPKS (Tindak Pidana Kekerasan Seksual) that had passed in 2022 did recognize digital s*xual violence, including revenge p*rn, a needed step forward. Yet the main problem came with law enforcement personnel still lacks gender sensitivity training and often mishandles these cases. It can discourage the victims to report it and avoid legal cases due to their mistrust on authorities. Public morality often still blamed the victims rather than the main criminals, in which it need a shift in cultural perspective.

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: The main issues with this case are two things: public lack of awareness and law enforcement lacks their training on handling these issues

Author: glassesofwater
Content: If we want to be considered a global nation and want to be on the world stage we must have protections in place for women. Especially with the mental health crisis plaguing indonesia

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: Tackle these two, and you would have a much more significant positive impact for going against revenge p-rn

Author: glassesofwater
Content: It’s also the police don’t know what to do with these situations, don’t care, or just blame the woman.

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: Yeah, the law enforcement as a whole lack the training and procedures

Author: glassesofwater
Content: In the western world, police are being more trained in things like dealing with mental health, and assault against women. However in Indonesia a lot of women are scared to deal with the police (unless they have money) as they often blame the woman.

Author: flarexxjeans
Content:
as far as i know, Pasal 14
(1) Setiap Orang yang tanpa hak:
a. melakukan perekaman dan/atau mengambil
gambar atau tangkapan layar yang bermuatan
seksual di luar kehendak atau tanpa persetujuan
orang yang menjadi objek perekaman atau
gambar atau tangkapan layar;
b. mentransmisikan informasi elektronik dan/atau
dokumen elektronik yang bermuatan seksual di
luar kehendak penerima yang ditujukan terhadap
keinginan seksual; dan/atau
c. melakukan penguntitan dan/atau pelacakan
menggunakan sistem elektronik terhadap orang
yang menjadi obyek dalam informasi/dokumen
elektronik untuk tujuan seksual,
dipidana karena melakukan kekerasan seksual
berbasis elektronik, dengan pidana penjara paling
lama 4 (empat) tahun dan/atau denda paling banyak
Rp200.000.000,00 (dua ratus juta rupiah). this is what uu tpks has stated, it says "diytujukan terhadap keinginan seksual" whereas revenge porn is intended as a thread or revenge
